::Epyon/Hot Rod::

Epyon nodded at Khonkolor. They couldn't leave him for the others
taking.

Hot Rod came over. I agree we ust try something, but doing it now would
be dangerus to us! Too many fightiers. We'll just have to watch him
untill we are done here."
